Body.Description: Delete an IPv4 Reservation in a given network, passing the IPv4 address Refence Object.
Body.Label: Infoblox - Delete IPv4 Reservation
Body.Name: Infoblox-DeleteIPv4Reservation

InputDefinition.Description: The API call can be made to Intersight or an external endpoint added as Target. Target should be in claimed or connected state. Please refer Supported Endpoints section in the Web API request end user documentation for the list of Intersight Targets on which Web API task can be invoked. An empty value for this input indicates that the API call is made to Intersight.
InputDefinition.Label: External Target
InputDefinition.Name: Target

Properties.Selector: /api/v1/asset/Targets?$filter=((TargetType eq HTTPEndpoint and Status eq Claimed) or ((TargetType eq PureStorageFlashArray or TargetType eq HitachiVirtualStoragePlatform or TargetType eq NetAppActiveIqUnifiedManager or TargetType eq TerraformCloud or TargetType eq VmwareVcenter or TargetType eq APIC) and Status eq Connected))

InputDefinition.Description: The Infoblox unique object reference to identify the IPv4 address.
InputDefinition.Label: IPv4 Address Reference Object
InputDefinition.Name: ipAddressReferenceObject

Batch.Description: Delete the reservation for a given IP address
Batch.Label: Delete an IPv4 Reservation
Batch.Name: InvokeGenericWebApi1

Body.Description: Delete an IPv4 Reservation in a given network, passing the IPv4 address Refence Object.
Body.Name: Infoblox - Delete IPv4 Reservation
